item.title: Exciting Features Coming in The Sims 4's Adventure Awaits Expansion Pack
item.description:
The Sims 4 's next expansion pack has been announced, and players are beyond excited to learn more about what's coming. So far, gamers have gotten access to a reveal trailer, a gameplay trailer, and a detailed blog post. While The Sims 4 Adventure Awaits only releases on October 2, the gameplay trailer was released three weeks prior to its launch, giving fans plenty of time to analyze everything single detail and get an idea of the features that are coming with the pack.

If players want to make sure that they haven't missed anything, they've come to the right place, as this article goes over the most exciting features coming to The Sims 4 with the Adventure Awaits expasion pack.

Imaginary Friends

Creepy or Cute?

One of the features that immediately stood out to fans when the reveal and gameplay trailer for Adventure Awaits were revealed was the return of the imaginary friend. Simmers initially thought that imaginary friends would be added to The Sims 4 with the Growing Together expansion pack, as it's the one that most resembles The Sims 3 's Generations EP, but that was not the case.

In The Sims 4 , players will be able to choose to interact with their imaginary friends and build a friendship that lasts forever, keep them around as a toy, or say goodbye forever and never see them again. It sounds brutal, but it is a feature that many had asked for in The Sims 3 .

Host and Plan Getaways

You Can Even Create a Detailed Schedule

With Adventure Awaits, players can host and fully plan a getaway. Players can select a schedule preset and edit it to meet their preferences but they can also create a new schedule from stratch. However, just to get an idea of how versatile getaways can be with this pack, here are some of the getaway presets coming to The Sims 4 :

  • Fitness Retreat
  • Outdoor Kids Camp
  • Romantic Competition
  • Cooking Competition
  • Cozy Bed and Breakfast
  • Creativity Retreat
  • Senior Living Community
  • Teen Popularity Contest

To create these themed getaways, players will have to make up a schedule, choose roles for the Sims on site, select the right venue, and add rules. There are dozens of custom options, so the possibilities are nearly endless, especially if players have access to more expansion packs.

Formative Moments and Challenges

Acquire Lifelong Traits

Formative moments weren't shown in great detail in the gameplay trailer, but gamers were able to get the gist of it. When doing certain activities, Sims can initiate a formative moment, which will come with its own mastery challenges. If the Sim is able to complete these formative challenges during a critical stage of a Sim's life and unlock a permanent trait.

While this was only shown for the Archery Skill, which will be introduced in the new pack, it is likely that this is a cross-pack feature that will include formative moments for several other skills, especially those available to younger Sims.

Modular Playgrounds

Create the Park of Your Dreams

Modular playgrounds are going to be part of The Sims 4 once the Adventure Awaits expansion is out. Whether builders want to incorporate this feature into their getaways or not, it's up to them, but it'll be great for parks.

Players can grab certain stairs, swings, and sliders, parts and place them next to each other to create all sorts of playgrounds. Additionally, it seems that they may be placeable in other areas, as in the trailer gamers can spot a slide leading into a pool.

Fitness Skill Equipment and Workout Options

Go to Spin Class or Lift Some Weights

There are already several activities in The Sims 4 that boost Sims' Fitness Skill, but a whole lot more are about to become available with the Adventure Awaits EP. From spin class and free weights to board diving and kayaking, Adventure Awaits is adding several activities related to the Fitness Skill in The Sims 4 .

Players can plan their getaways around these various athletic activities or they can simply enjoy them from the comfort of their own homes with the new equipment coming with the pack.

Create Custom Venues

Make Custom Venues for Your Getaways

Builders can create their own custom venues and select its settings according to their preferences. Then, they can have it as a hangout spot for Sims or host a getaway at the venue.

Here, players select custom roles for the Sims that will appear in this venue, so that they have certain activities assigned to them, such as Baker or Staff, for example.

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: Most Ambitious RPGs Ever Made
item.description:
Summary

  • Players seek ambitious RPGs with vast worlds, memorable characters, and rich storytelling.
  • CD Projekt Red overcame obstacles to create the iconic RPG The Witcher, setting a high standard.
  • From Disco Elysium to Elden Ring, ambitious RPGs with unique worldbuilding leave a lasting impact.

Video games without ambition aren't all that fun to play for obvious reasons. Players want to check out games where developers aimed for the moon and (mostly) stuck the landing, and this is especially true when it comes to role-playing games, where fans can get lost.

Getting lost in a massive world with a ton of things to do is something that helps these RPGs stand out, since their ambition is clear as day for players to see. The incredible writing, memorable characters, and a story for the ages will keep fans coming back for more.

The Witcher

A Studio Known For Polish Localization Took The Plunge And Developed An Ambitious RPG

3 Images
3 Images
The Witcher
7.0 /10
Released
October 30, 2007

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
CD Projekt Red
Platform(s)
PC
Powered by

The Witcher 3 was ambitious in its own right, but one can argue that CD Projekt Red had to overcome more hurdles for the first game in this now-beloved series. The studio was mainly known for Polish localizations of BioWare games and showed a demo to this company, getting a lot of constructive feedback on why their game simply wasn't good enough.

However, the developers at CD Projekt Red never gave up. They used the Aurora Engine (used for the Neverwinter Nights games) and crafted one of the most iconic and ambitious RPGs ever made that fans loved, paving the way for the sequels to become more mainstream than anyone could've expected.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

A Small Studio With Unproven Talent Developed Something Special

10 Images
10 Images
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
156
9.4 /10
Released
April 24, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Sandfall Interactive
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

For a studio that featured people with little to no experience in the video game industry, it's amazing how Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 took over the world by storm. An ex-Ubisoft employee amassed a team of passionate individuals and let players enjoy one of the greatest modern turn-based video games of all time.

Combining turn-based combat with real-time inputs made for a dynamic combat system that players would have a great time with. The journey to stop the Painter from killing off people past a certain age in a beautiful world makes the developer's ambition clear as day and ensures that Expedition 33 will leave a lasting impact on players.

Dragon Age: Origins

BioWare's Attempt To Modernize Their RPGs Was A Resounding Success

Dragon Age: Origins
9 /10
17
9.1 /10
Released
November 3, 2009

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content
Developer(s)
BioWare
Platform(s)
PS3, Xbox 360, PC
Powered by

BioWare had a major task to accomplish ahead of them with Dragon Age: Origins . Devising a whole new fantasy world and modernizing the role-playing gameplay they were accustomed to in a bid to cater to a large audience made it clear that the studio was being more ambitious than ever before, especially with EA's backing.

They passed this test with flying colors, with the impressive variety of origin stories and the game's excellent role-playing ensuring that players can clock in multiple playthroughs in this title without getting bored. It single-handedly turned the Dragon Age IP into one of the most beloved universes in gaming, and it's a shame that BioWare hasn't reached the same heights as Origins with later Dragon Age games.

Disco Elysium

The Creators Developed An Incredible World That Features Some Incredible Lore

Disco Elysium
9 /10
12
9.6 /10
Released
October 15, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs, Violence
Developer(s)
ZA/UM
Platform(s)
PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Stadia
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Disco Elysium is one of the most ambitious RPGs ever made, using the simple district of Martinaise as a stage to let players enjoy the incredible worldbuilding and lore that the people behind this game spent so much time making. It's a shame that conflicts with the ZA/UM higher-ups meant that the people behind this game are now not a part of the company.

Harry's amnesia is used to familiarize players with the incredible world, learning about everything from its complex politics to the threat of the Pale that looms over the world. The sheer scale and ambition of this world are in a class of their own, ensuring that the story-driven approach of Disco Elysium will leave a lasting impression on players.

Elden Ring

The Amazing Sandbox Shows FromSoftware's Ambitions In Spades

6 Images
6 Images
Elden Ring
10 /10
69
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
From Software
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Elden Ring is one of the greatest open-world games ever made, showing just how much FromSoftware had grown after Dark Souls became a massive hit. This action RPG template was fused with an open-world setting, with the developer going all out to design one of the greatest video game sandboxes of all time.

The gargantuan scale and incredible visual design of this open world make Elden Ring arguably the most ambitious FromSoftware game of all time. Their efforts paid off, with the game reaching sales numbers that no one could've expected.

Cyberpunk 2077

A Studio With No Experience Making First-Person Games Reworked Their Engine For This Cyberpunk RPG

6 Images
6 Images
Cyberpunk 2077
6 /10
116
9.0 /10
Released
December 10, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Developer(s)
CD Projekt Red
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch 2, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the greatest video games ever made, but there was a time when the ambition of this game would've eaten CD Projekt Red whole. REDengine was impressive, but the developers had no experience with how to make a first-person game with this video game engine.

The developers had to learn certain things from scratch while working on a tight deadline. While it seemed like CD Projekt Red had buckled under the weight of this ambition at first, a string of updates and patches helped players see the brilliant narrative and engaging gameplay of this title that was hidden underneath all the bugs.

Baldur's Gate 3

The Sheer Scope Of This CRPG Is Incredible

Baldur's Gate 3
9 /10
141
9.7 /10
Released
August 3, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Violence
Developer(s)
Larian Studios
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, PC, macOS
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Baldur's Gate 3 is one of the best RPGs of all time, with its ambition being one of the biggest reasons why Larian Studios knocked it out of the park with this title. The scope of this title was gargantuan and aimed to take into account every decision made by the player in this branching narrative.

This means that players can potentially clock in thousands of hours in this title across multiple playthroughs and still see unique events play out every single time. This, coupled with the better production values of Baldur's Gate 3 , makes it one of the greatest modern RPGs players can get their hands on.

Final Fantasy 7

The First-Ever AAA RPG That Made A Huge Gamble... And Won

Final Fantasy 7
21
8.8 /10
Released
January 31, 1997

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Blood, Fantasy Violence, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes
Developer(s)
Square Enix
Platform(s)
PlayStation (Original), PC, iOS, Android, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PS4
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

The first-ever AAA game of all time was bound to be an ambitious affair that would be a huge gamble by investing a ton of money in both development and marketing. The PS1's improved hardware allowed SquareSoft to let their ambitions soar as players were treated to an incredible Final Fantasy game that combined sci-fi and fantasy elements to great effect.

The end result is one of the most iconic video games ever made that fans can't get enough of. Final Fantasy 7 's ambitious nature was clear as day and is something that is replicated in a series of remakes that make things bigger and bolder than ever before.

item.title: Best Games That Will Make You Feel Something
item.description:
Summary

  • Movies evoke emotions easily, while games require more time & effort due to longer campaigns.
  • Unique gaming experiences like Journey and Undertale stand out emotionally.
  • Retro Game Challenge offers nostalgic vibes, while The Walking Dead is an emotional rollercoaster.

People go to the movies to see something different. If they're seeking action, they want to feel excitement. From comedy, they want to laugh. For dramas, they want to be moved, or maybe even cry. It’s easy to feel something from watching a movie, but that's not always the case with a video game.

That’s because it takes so much longer to get through a game’s campaign than it does to wrap up a movie’s runtime. Even a three-hour movie like Titanic is shorter than an epic like Final Fantasy 7 . This begs the question: Are there any games where players are undoubtedly made to feel something during the experience? It’s tough to quantify, but let’s go ahead and try to think of some gaming examples that have evoked a variety of feelings from their players.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

A Country’s Fight For Survival

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
156
9.4 /10
Released
April 24, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 takes place in a world filled with grief wherein a yearly culling by a being known as The Paintress wipes out every person of a certain age, like Thanos' Snap if the villain had an obsession with birthdays. Despite no Expedition team surviving their pilgrimage, every year a new group sets out to find and slay The Paintress.

Expedition 33 is the group this game centers on, and even though it seems pointless, these groups provide hope to their people and to each other. Throughout their journey, players will come across the progress of previous expeditions, and some will even indirectly aid the progress of Expedition 33. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 , overall, is about giving players a sense of purpose and conviction, but in doing so, it will also cause them a ton of sadness.

Journey

Nonverbal Bonding

Journey
8 /10
9.5 /10
Released
March 13, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E For Everyone due to Mild Fantasy, Violence
Powered by

Journey is an isolating game to play alone, but what compelled players back when it first released on PS3 was the randomized multiplayer system. Along their journey, players will encounter another red-robed character, one almost exactly like themselves but controlled by another player.

They couldn’t use voice or text chat, but players don't need these features to communicate, because they all have the same goal: reach the mountaintop. As the name implies, Journey really feels like a complete adventure, even if it is only a few hours long. Devoid of a written story, players are sure to feel something by reaching the summit alone or with a friend in Journey .

Retro Game Challenge

Feeling Nostalgic

Retro Game Challenge
Action
RPG
Racing
Systems
Released
November 15, 2007
ESRB
E For Everyone // Alcohol Reference, Mild Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
Developer(s)
indieszero Co., Ltd.

Powered by

Retro Game Challenge is a DS game that features a collection of fake NES-like games and consoles. Players assume the role of a kid growing up with their first 8-bit console in Japan. Players can engage with a varied of retro platformers, shooters, RPGs, and more.

They can also get help from NPCs or magazines when they get stuck, emulating the feeling every '80s kid had with their NES journey and a lack of online walkthroughs. It's a specific game for a specific type of player, but those players will be brought back to their childhoods in a big way. Even better, there are two sequels between the DS and 3DS, for those interested.

Shadow Of The Colossus

Loss, Emptiness, And Betrayal

Shadow of the Colossus (2018)
8.9 /10
Released
February 6, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Blood, Violence
Powered by

Shadow of the Colossus is a simple game to describe, and still one of the most unique experiences ever put on a console. The game takes place in a giant open world filled with towering creatures known as the Colossi. Finding, fighting, and defeating them is supposed to help their souls revive the main character, Wander's, presumed betrothed.

Finding these Colossi is a haunting process, as besides them, Wander, and Wander's horse, Agro, nothing else inhabits the world. The fights against them are unsettling because they feel so unearthly and wrong. The Colossi fight back, but their deaths aren't violent; they're quiet and sad. It’s a drab world wherein players will start to develop a guilty conscience regarding the Colossi, in any of the Shadow of the Colossus’ many versions.

Tetris Effect

Becoming One With The Universe

Tetris Effect
Puzzle
Systems
Released
November 9, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E
Powered by

Tetris Effect was released for the PS4 and was also compatible with the console’s PSVR setup, which is really something special. The game is fun on its own, but the VR adds a whole new level of connection. It’s one of the most chilled-out experiences that players can have with a puzzle game.

With a good pair of headphones and a PSVR strapped in, Tetris Effect becomes something of a transformative, even euphoric experience that cannot be replicated in any other version or any other game. Tetris Effect: Connected , the re-release, is also fun for players who like multiplayer.

Undertale

Subverting RPG Expectations

Undertale
11
9.6 /10
Released
September 15, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ for Everyone 10+: Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Mild Language, Simulated Gambling, Use of Tobacco
Powered by

Undertale looks like a classic RPG from the 90s, which was intentional, as creator Toby Fox loves EarthBound . Unlike most RPGs, from the 90s or otherwise, Undertale is not like the mainstream releases from AAA studios.

Players will develop empathy for the monsters they fight, even the bosses, and the whole game can be completed without killing a single soul, instead winning battles through conversation. With unforgettable allies and enemies alike, Undertale quickly gathered an online following that no indie game has achieved since. That’s quite the emotional impact for an indie game from a solo developer.

Valiant Hearts: The Great War

The Greatest World War 1 Game?

Valiant Hearts: The Great War
7 /10
9.0 /10
Released
June 25, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Violence, Blood, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco
Powered by

When talking about 2D games that use the UbiArt engine at Ubisoft, most people tend to think about the Rayman games. However, one of the more underrated examples is Valiant Hearts: The Great War , which takes place during World War 1 and specifically revolves around France.

Players can play as multiple characters through the game's four episodic chapters, mostly solving environmental and stealth puzzles. It may be 2D, but players will easily form a bond with their crew and shed a few tears as well when their inevitable ugly doom comes to pass.

The Walking Dead (Telltale)

Connection And Loss

The Walking Dead
9.3 /10
Released
April 24, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language
Powered by

Telltale’s first breakout success was the first season of their The Walking Dead adaptation. The story takes place alongside the comics, rather than being a direct retelling, and it features a cast of all-original and very well-realized characters, with a few recognizable cameos as the seasons go on.

This first season is about a former convict, Lee, who meets a young girl, Clementine, at the outset of a zombie apocalypse. The pair then tries to find a group in the world that will take them in. To avoid spoilers, let’s just say it’s an emotional rollercoaster, and no matter what choices players make to shift the story around as it progresses, the devastating end result will always be the same.

item.title: Fortnite: Kai Cenat Icon Cup Guide (Get Free Kai Cenat Cosmetics)
item.description:
Fortnite and Kai Cenat are collaborating this Friday, and the iconic streamer is getting not one but two skins as well as a handful of other cosmetic items. It's not unusual for Fortnite to host special cups in order to give players a chance to unlock skins before they hit the Item Shop, but that is not the case with Kai Cenat, unfortunately.

However, gamers will have the opportunity to unlock him and some of his cosmetics for free. This guide tells players how the Kai Cenat Icon Cup works so they can participate and ensure that they get some hands on some Kai Cenat freebies in Fortnite .

How to Get Free Kai Cenat Items in Fortnite

Gamers can unlock two Kai Cenat skins in Fortnite as well as the rest of his Icon Series set by participating in the Kai Cenat Icon Cup and being among the top players in their region . The tournament is taking place on September 12, the same day that these cosmetics will appear in the Item Shop. Gamers can check its exact starting time in their region by visiting the in-game Compete page in Fortnite or the Competitive Fortnite schedule webpage.

While this will be a very hard goal for many players to reach, gamers will be happy to know that they can will receive the Any Means Possible spray - a Kai Cenat-themed spray - for scoring 8 points in the tournament .

Here are all of the Kai Cenat cosmetics being given away in the Kai Cenat Icon Cup and how many players per region will be able to claim them:

How to Participate in the Kai Cenat Icon Cup in Fortnite

The Kai Cenat Icon Cup is a mobile cup, which means only gamers on mobile platforms will be able to participate. This is a Solo tournament, and it's set in the Blitz Royale game mode , so it is bound to be filled with hectic fun.

The competition will be live for a total of 90 minutes, and during this time, players can enter a maximum of 15 matches. in order to score as many points as possible.

Players who miss out on this opportunity will be able to purchase Kai Cenat cosmetics in the Item Shop starting September 12 at 8 PM ET.

item.title: Final Fantasy 14 Mobile Gets Feature Players Have Wanted for Years
item.description:
Final Fantasy 14 Mobile is introducing its first dyeable mount to the game. While this addition is being received well by players of the mobile version of Final Fantasy 14 , fans of the original MMORPG Final Fantasy 14 are upset, as they've been asking for this feature for years.

Final Fantasy 14 has an expansive list of dyes that players can procure to change the color of most of the gear in the game, plus select furniture for apartments and homes. However, beyond changing the color of a Company Chocobo, players who have wanted that level of customization for their mounts have been largely left in the cold.

Final Fantasy 14 Mobile Gets Feature Players Want in the Original

Final Fantasy 14 Mobile is adding a new mount called the Magitek Skateboard, which looks like a hoverboard. The base Skateboard is white and blue, but it's also the first original mount in the game that players can customize using dye. Given the importance of mounts in the game, being able to customize them in some way is something a lot of players are interested in, and have repeatedly asked Square Enix for over the years. However, this mount is limited to the mobile version of the game, and players seem doubtful that the feature will be brought to the original Final Fantasy 14 MMORPG.

As one might expect, this is stirring up frustration within the FF14 community. So far, the mobile game has only released in China, with no announced release date for a global version, so most western gamers have no way of checking out the new mount. However, the biggest complaint is that Final Fantasy 14 Mobile is getting this feature when the original MMORPG still lacks it. Players have previously been upset by FF14 Mobile getting more advanced dye channels than the original version, giving mobile players more opportunities for unique looks.

Though Final Fantasy 14 is still a very loved game by the community, it has shortcomings, and issues like these make them stand out all the more. Players are already frustrated with the aging infrastructure of the game that limits things like the number of glamour plates and equipment storage a user has access to, as well as limited housing that's insufficient for heavily populated servers. Even the addition of a second dye channel to gear disappointed most players due to secondary channels often only encompassing tiny details like buttons or buckles. For now, it's not known if FF14 Mobile 's features will ever be added to the original game. If such a reveal is made, it will likely be at the upcoming Final Fantasy 14 Fan Festivals that will be held in 2026.
